show.title: The Love That Kills
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा 
https://links.kukufm.com/3GQVEq
show.description: "The Love That Kills" is a gripping drama that follows the unraveling of Raghav Malhotra's family due to the unchecked entitlement of his son Sid and father Vijay, sparked by Sid's destructive act at a luxury hotel. As tensions with Raghav's boss Srishti Mehra escalate, the series explores accountability, family dynamics, and the devastating cost of pride.
show.description_secondary: "The Love That Kills" is a gripping drama that follows the unraveling of Raghav Malhotra's family due to the unchecked entitlement of his son Sid and father Vijay, sparked by Sid's destructive act at a luxury hotel. As tensions with Raghav's boss Srishti Mehra escalate, the series explores accountability, family dynamics, and the devastating cost of pride.
